Content: This was my very first foray into React (as I'm sure it is for many).
But as I know that 3x3 connect four is a solved game, I aways play a 5x5 varient myself, so I took it upon myself to code this.
The rules are simple: Any Row or Column filled in by a player gives them a win.
If you fill in either of the diagonals, you also win
